title: Pongalo Pongal Song Lyrics Mahanadi
stanzas:
muppaattan kaalam thottu
muppogam yaaraala
kal maedu thaandi varum
kaveri neeraalaa

saeththoda serndha vitha
naathu vidaathaa
naathoda seithi solla
kaathu varaatha

sevvaazha sengarumbu
saadhi malli thottam thaan
ellaame ingirukka
yaedhum illa vaattamthaan

namma sorgam enbathu
mannil ulladhu vaanil illaiyadi
namma inbam enbathu
kannil ulladhu
kanavil illaiyadi
